t: Who can create a Brand Store?
Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Creating and maintaining a Brand Store is free, and you do not need to advertise on Amazon to create a Brand Store. Once you create a Brand Store, you can showcase your products, brand story, and lifestyle content to engage shoppers.

t: How Amazon’s big private-label business is growing and leaving small brands to protect against knockoffs

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 1 day ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.

t: Brand Stores: Kostenlos eine Markenseite auf Amazon erstellen | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores helfen Ihnen dabei, die Markenbekanntheit zu steigern, indem Sie Ihre Marke und Ihren Produktkatalog unter Ihrer eigenen Amazon-Webadresse präsentieren. Sie können einen Brand Store ohne zusätzliche Kosten erstellen – ohne dass eine Programmierung notwendig ist.
